en-GB.subject: We can't wait to welcome you to DEVOCEAN Lodge ğŸŒ´
en-GB.preheader: Your stay is just around the corner
en-GB.heading: We Can't Wait to Welcome You!
en-GB.headerSubtitle: Your home by the ocean in beautiful Ponta do Ouro
en-GB.intro: We're excited to welcome you soon to DEVOCEAN Lodge in beautiful Ponta do Ouro! Your stay is just around the corner, and we're here to make it smooth, comfortable, and truly memorable.
en-GB.helpOffer: If there's anything you'd like us to prepare ahead of your arrival, please don't hesitate to let us know.
en-GB.hostText: Sean, your host, will be available throughout your stay. He's a treasure chest of local stories and insights â€” from daily village life to hidden gems, local markets, and unforgettable excursions. Don't be shy to ask; you might just walk away with a great story or two!
en-GB.lennonText: Around the lodge, you might meet a cheerful young boy â€” that's Lennon, Sean's son. He's proud of his bunnies and often offers guests a little farm tour. What started as a small COVID-era project has blossomed into a mini-farm with rabbits and chickens, supporting food security for guests and staff alike.
en-GB.lisaText: Lisa, Lennon's mum, also offers wonderfully relaxing massages â€” highly recommended!
en-GB.raquelIntro: Our kitchen is led by Raquel, who serves:
en-GB.dinnerHours: 5:00 â€“ 9:00 PM (except Tuesdays â€” her well-deserved day off)
en-GB.housekeepingText: Sidinia, Deolinda, and Ivanilda keep the lodge and your room spotless and cosy. Two of them are always on-site, and one starts early to prepare breakfast on request. You may also meet Zeka (JosÃ©) and Silvano, who handle maintenance around the property, and Luis and Beqi, who are currently working on new construction projects.
en-GB.directionsStep1: Enter the village via the new tar road. You'll pass the local market ("barracas") on your left and the minibus taxi rank on your right.
en-GB.directionsStep2: Continue up the small hill until you see Love CafÃ© on your right.
en-GB.directionsStep3: Turn right immediately after the cafÃ© and continue for about 100 metres.
en-GB.directionsStep4: When you spot the Police Station on your right, look for the DEVOCEAN sign and the wooden gate â€” feel free to open it and park inside.
en-GB.closingText: We can't wait to welcome you and share the DEVOCEAN spirit with you. Get ready for a stay filled with warmth, stories, and the sound of the ocean.

af-ZA.subject: Ons kan nie wag om jou by DEVOCEAN Lodge te verwelkom nie ğŸŒ´
af-ZA.preheader: Jou verblyf is net om die draai
af-ZA.heading: Ons Kan Nie Wag om Jou te Verwelkom Nie!
af-ZA.headerSubtitle: Jou tuiste by die see in pragtige Ponta do Ouro
af-ZA.intro: Ons is opgewonde om jou binnekort by DEVOCEAN Lodge in pragtige Ponta do Ouro te verwelkom! Jou verblyf is net om die draai, en ons is hier om dit vlot, gemaklik en waarlik onvergeetlik te maak.
af-ZA.helpOffer: As daar enigiets is wat jy graag wil hÃª ons moet voorberei voor jou aankoms, moet asseblief nie huiwer om ons te laat weet nie.
af-ZA.hostText: Sean, jou gasheer, sal beskikbaar wees regdeur jou verblyf. Hy is 'n skatkis van plaaslike stories en insigte â€” van daaglikse dorpslewe tot verborge juwele, plaaslike markte en onvergeetlike uitstappies. Moenie skaam wees om te vra nie; jy kan dalk met een of twee wonderlike stories wegstap!
af-ZA.lennonText: Rondom die lodge kan jy dalk 'n vrolike jong seun ontmoet â€” dit is Lennon, Sean se seun. Hy is trots op sy hase en bied gereeld gaste 'n klein plaastoer aan. Wat as 'n klein COVID-era projek begin het, het gegroei tot 'n mini-plaas met hase en hoenders, wat voedselsekuriteit vir gaste en personeel ondersteun.
af-ZA.lisaText: Lisa, Lennon se ma, bied ook wonderlik ontspannende masserings aan â€” hoogs aanbeveel!
af-ZA.raquelIntro: Ons kombuis word gelei deur Raquel, wat bedien:
af-ZA.dinnerHours: 17:00 â€“ 21:00 (behalwe Dinsdae â€” haar welverdiende rusdag)
af-ZA.housekeepingText: Sidinia, Deolinda en Ivanilda hou die lodge en jou kamer vlekkeloos en gesellig. Twee van hulle is altyd op die perseel, en een begin vroeg om ontbyt op aanvraag voor te berei. Jy kan ook Zeka (JosÃ©) en Silvano ontmoet, wat onderhoud rondom die eiendom hanteer, en Luis en Beqi, wat tans aan nuwe konstruksieprojekte werk.
af-ZA.directionsStep1: Kom die dorp binne via die nuwe teerpad. Jy sal die plaaslike mark ("barracas") aan jou linkerkant en die minibustaxi-standplek aan jou regterkant verbygaan.
af-ZA.directionsStep2: Hou aan op die klein heuwel totdat jy Love CafÃ© aan jou regterkant sien.
af-ZA.directionsStep3: Draai regs onmiddellik na die kafee en hou aan vir ongeveer 100 meter.
af-ZA.directionsStep4: Wanneer jy die Polisiestasie aan jou regterkant sien, soek die DEVOCEAN-teken en die houtpoort â€” voel vry om dit oop te maak en binne te parkeer.
af-ZA.closingText: Ons kan nie wag om jou te verwelkom en die DEVOCEAN-gees met jou te deel nie. Maak gereed vir 'n verblyf gevul met warmte, stories en die geluid van die see.

zu.heading: Asikwazi Ukulinda Ukukwamukela!
zu.headerSubtitle: Ikhaya lakho olwandle e-Ponta do Ouro enhle
zu.intro: Sijabulile ukukwamukela maduze e-DEVOCEAN Lodge e-Ponta do Ouro enhle! Ukuhlala kwakho kusondele, futhi silapha ukwenza kube lula, kube ntofontofo, futhi kukhunjuzwe ngempela.
zu.helpOffer: Uma kunento ofuna sikulungisele ngaphambi kokuza kwakho, sicela ungangabazi ukusazisa.
zu.hostText: USean, umsingathi wakho, uzoba khona ngesikhathi sonke sokuhlala kwakho. Ungumthombo wezindaba zendawo nolwazi â€” kusukela ekuphileni kwansuku zonke edolobhaneni kuya ematsheleni afihlekile, ezimakethe zasendaweni, nasezihambweni ezingeke zikhohlakale. Ungabi nesibindi sokubuza; ungase uhambe nendaba eyodwa noma ezimbili ezinhle!
zu.lennonText: Eduzane ne-lodge, ungase uhlangane nomfana omncane ojabulayo â€” nguLennon, indodana kaSean. Uyaziqhenya ngezimvukuzi zakhe futhi uvame ukunikeza izivakashi ukuvakasha okuncane epulazini. Okwaqala njengephrojekthi encane yesikhathi se-COVID sekukhule kwaba ipulazi elincane elinezimvukuzi nezinkukhu, okusekela ukuphepha kokudla kwezivakashi nabasebenzi.
zu.lisaText: ULisa, umama kaLennon, uphinde anikeze ukwelashwa okumnandi okuphumuzayo â€” kunconywa kakhulu!
zu.dinnerHours: 17:00 â€“ 21:00 (ngaphandle ngoLwesibili â€” usuku lwakhe lokuphuma olufanele)
zu.housekeepingText: OSidinia, Deolinda, no-Ivanilda bagcina i-lodge nekamelo lakho kuhlanzekile futhi kuthokozisile. Ababili babo bahlala khona, futhi oyedwa uqala ekuseni ukulungiselela isidlo sasekuseni uma kucelwa. Ungase futhi uhlangane noZeka (JosÃ©) noSilvano, abaphatha ukugcinwa komhlaba, noLuis noBequi, abanje basebenza kumaphrojekthi amasha okwakha.
zu.directionsStep1: Ngena edolobhaneni ngomgwaqo omusha we-tar. Uzodlula emakethe yasendaweni ("barracas") ngakwesokunxele sakho nendawo yokuma kwemoto yetekisi yeminibhasi ngakwesokudla sakho.
zu.directionsStep2: Qhubeka unyuke intaba encane uze ubone i-Love CafÃ© ngakwesokudla sakho.
zu.directionsStep3: Phendukela kwesokudla ngokushesha emva kwekhafethi bese uqhubeka cishe amamitha angu-100.
zu.directionsStep4: Uma ubona iSiteshi samaPhoyisa ngakwesokudla sakho, funa isibonakaliso se-DEVOCEAN nesango lokhuni â€” zizwe ukhululekile ukusivula futhi upake ngaphakathi.
zu.closingText: Asikwazi ukulinda ukukwamukela nokwabelana ngomoya we-DEVOCEAN nawe. Lungiselela ukuhlala okugcwele ukufudumala, izindaba nomsindo wolwandle.

sw.heading: Hatuwezi Kusubiri Kukukaribisha!
sw.headerSubtitle: Nyumba yako kando ya bahari katika Ponta do Ouro nzuri
sw.intro: Tunafurahi kukukaribisha hivi karibuni kwenye DEVOCEAN Lodge katika Ponta do Ouro nzuri! Muda wako wa kukaa unakaribia, na tuko hapa kufanya uwe laini, wa starehe, na wa kukumbukwa kweli.
sw.helpOffer: Kama kuna kitu chochote ungependa tuandae kabla ya kuwasili kwako, tafadhali usisite kutuambia.

sw.hostText: Sean, mwenyeji wako, atapatikana wakati wote wa kukaa kwako. Usiwe na aibu kuuliza; unaweza kurudi nyumbani na hadithi moja au mbili nzuri!
sw.lennonText: Kuzunguka lodge, unaweza kukutana na kijana mzuri â€” huyo ni Lennon, mwana wa Sean. Anajivunia sungura wake na mara nyingi hutoa wageni ziara ndogo ya shamba. Kilichoanza kama mradi mdogo wa kipindi cha COVID kimekua kuwa shamba dogo lenye sungura na kuku, kinachounga usalama wa chakula kwa wageni na wafanyakazi.
sw.lisaText: Lisa, mama wa Lennon, pia hutoa massage za kupumzisha â€” zinashauriwa sana!
sw.raquelIntro: Jikoni letu linaongozwa na Raquel, ambaye hutumikia:
sw.dinnerHours: 17:00 â€“ 21:00 (isipokuwa Jumanne â€” siku yake ya kupumzika inayostahili)
sw.housekeepingText: Sidinia, Deolinda, na Ivanilda huweka lodge na chumba chako safi na vya starehe. Wawili wao wako pale kila wakati, na mmoja huanza mapema kuandaa kifungua kinywa kwa ombi. Unaweza pia kukutana na Zeka (JosÃ©) na Silvano, wanaoshughulikia matengenezo ya mali, na Luis na Beqi, ambao kwa sasa wanafanya kazi kwenye miradi mipya ya ujenzi.
sw.directionsStep1: Ingia kijijini kupitia barabara mpya ya lami. Utapita soko la kienyeji ("barracas") upande wako wa kushoto na kituo cha teksi za minibasi upande wako wa kulia.
sw.directionsStep2: Endelea juu ya kilima kidogo hadi uone Love CafÃ© upande wako wa kulia.
sw.directionsStep3: Geuka kulia mara moja baada ya mkahawa na uendelee kwa mita 100.
sw.directionsStep4: Unapoona Kituo cha Polisi upande wako wa kulia, tafuta alama ya DEVOCEAN na lango la mbao â€” jisikie huru kulifungua na kupaka ndani.
sw.closingText: Hatuwezi kusubiri kukukaribisha na kushiriki roho ya DEVOCEAN nawe. Jiandae kwa kukaa kujaa joto, hadithi, na sauti ya bahari.
